snippet: Third Point called for the dismissal of the technology company’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, after revealing that the Yahoo leader had inaccurately stated his academic credentials.
abstract: Third Point called for the dismissal of the technology company’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, after revealing that the Yahoo leader had inaccurately stated his academic credentials.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Third Point Demands Yahoo C.E.O. Be Fired by Monday
